titles.title: Protecting Seniors from Emergency Scams Act
To require the Federal Trade Commission to submit a report to Congress on scams targeting seniors, and for other purposes.
Protecting Seniors from Emergency Scams Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Protecting Seniors from Emergency Scams ActThis bill requires the Federal Trade Commission to report on, and increase awareness regarding, scams targeting older adults. Specifically, the commission must
report on the number and type of scams that target older adults and provide policy recommendations to prevent such scams; revise the commission's web portal with current information about such scams, including contact information for law enforcement and adult protective services agencies; and coordinate with media outlets and law enforcement to disseminate such information.
